testCaseId.description: Unique identifier for the test case

suiteId.description: ID of the test suite this test case belongs to

executionTargetConfig.description: Execution target configuration as JSON string

executionTargetIntegrationId.description: Integration ID for execution target (new property name)

testRunId.description: Unique identifier for the test run

testRunStatus.description: Test run status (PENDING, RUNNING, PASSED, FAILED, AWAITING_EXTERNAL_RESULTS)

testSuiteId.description: Test suite ID for test runs

testCaseIds.description: Comma-separated list of test case IDs (for test runs)

testCaseIDs.description: Comma-separated list of test case IDs (for test suites stored as issues)

idempotencyKey.description: Idempotency key for test run deduplication

testSuites.description: JSON string containing test suites data

integrations.description: JSON string containing CI integration configurations

testRunIdempotencyIndex.description: JSON mapping of idempotency keys to test run IDs
